components.description:
Zero Width Joiner (ZWJ) is a Unicode character that joins two or more other characters together in sequence to create a new emoji.

Zero Width Joiner, pronounced "zwidge", is not an emoji and has no appearance by itself. This is an invisible character when used alone.

View Emoji ZWJ Sequences that use this character.
components.title: Zero Width Joiner

components.description: A rocket being propelled into space. Sometimes used to indicate a fast increase, for instance when referring to stocks going to the moon üöÄ (rising quickly in price).
components.title: Rocket

description: A male astronaut or cosmonaut shown wearing a space suit and helmet.
title: Man Astronaut

emoji_net_data.definition: The Man Astronaut emoji is a sequence of the ?? Man and ?? Rocket emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each characte http://emojipedia.org/male-astronaut/
emoji_net_data.name: man astronaut

bn:00001533n: Sexual maturity is the age or stage when an organism can reproduce.
The age or stage when an organism can reproduce
A man is a male human.
An adult human member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
A human member of the masculine sex or gender.
An adult person who is male (as opposed to a woman)

bn:00006655n: Member of the crew of a spacecraft.
A person trained to operate or serve aboard a spacecraft
A member of the crew of a spaceship or other spacecraft that travels beyond Earth's atmosphere, or someone trained to serve that purpose
An astronaut or cosmonaut is a person trained by a human spaceflight program to command, pilot, or serve as a crew member of a spacecraft.
A person trained to travel in a spacecraft
Person who commands, pilots, or serves as a crew member of a spacecraft
Member of the crew of a spaceship or other spacecraft, or someone trained for that purpose.

bn:00068085n: Reaction-propelled tool using only load propellants, without resorting to the surrounding medium.
A jet engine containing its own propellant and driven by reaction propulsion
A reaction engine that obtains thrust by jet propulsion which forms its jet exclusively from propellant.
A rocket engine especially a solid rocket or a hybrid rocket.
A rocket engine, or simply "rocket", is a jet engine that uses only stored propellant mass for forming its high speed propulsive jet.
Jet engine using stored propellant to produce jet propulsion
A rocket is a missile, spacecraft, aircraft or other vehicle that obtains thrust from a rocket engine.
Using exothermic chemical reactions of the propellant (s)

apple_vendor_description: The man astronaut emoji on Apple devices is a striking figure clad in a detailed white spacesuit, complete with a reflective visor that hints at the vastness of space.  Rendered with Apple's characteristic 3D shading and realistic lighting, the suit appears both functional and aspirational.  This emoji evokes themes of exploration, ambition, and venturing into the unknown, often used to signify dreams, achievements, or a fascination with science and discovery.
